categories.name: Hatchback
categories.description: Hatchbacks are compact cars with a two-box design, featuring a rear door that swings upward for easy access to the cargo area. They offer versatile storage space, often with foldable rear seats, and provide good fuel efficiency and maneuverability.

categories.name: Sedan
categories.description: Sedans are passenger cars with a three-box design, featuring four doors and a separate trunk. They offer spacious interiors, balanced handling, and focus on comfort and fuel efficiency.

cars.name: Honda Civic Type R
cars.description: The legendary Honda Civic Type R
